server.title: Server URL
server.description: reports will be periodically POSTed to this URL

useAuth.title: Use Device Authorization
useAuth.description: Attempt to authenticate with the server using the Chrome Verified Access API. The server must support this.

interval.title: Report Interval
interval.description: How frequently you want reports in minutes.

maxGeoAge.title: Max Geolocation Age
maxGeoAge.description: How stale (in seconds) is geolocation allowed to be. A lower value will result in higher power usage.
